quote: Be quick, but don't hurry.
name: John Wooden

quote: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: You can't win unless you learn how to lose.
name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
name: Billie Jean King

quote: Great players are willing to give up their own personal achievement for the achievement of the group. It enhances everybody.
name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
name: Phil Jackson

quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: Basketball doesn't build character. It reveals it.
name: James Naismith

quote: Discipline yourself, and others won't need to.
name: John Wooden

quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. Until your good is better and your better is best.
name: Tim Duncan

quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
name: John Wooden

quote: You don’t play against opponents; you play against the game of basketball.
name: Bobby Knight

quote: Coaching is about inspiring and teaching players to become their best selves.
name: Pat Summitt

quote: Push yourself again and again. Don't give an inch until the final buzzer sounds.
name: Larry Bird

quote: What you are as a person is far more important than what you are as a basketball player.
name: John Wooden

quote: Winning takes talent, but to repeat takes character.
name: John Wooden

quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: Basketball is a beautiful game when the five players on the court play with one heartbeat.
name: Dean Smith

quote: Work hard in practice to make the games easier.
name: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: Earn the right to be proud and confident.
name: John Wooden

quote: The best teams have chemistry. They communicate with each other and they sacrifice personal glory for a common goal.
name: Dave DeBusschere

quote: Success is peace of mind in knowing you did your best.
name: John Wooden

quote: The most important measure of how good a game I played was how much better I’d made my teammates play.
name: Bill Russell

quote: Teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one.
name: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: Don’t measure yourself by what you have accomplished, but by what you should have accomplished with your ability.
name: John Wooden

quote: The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle.
name: Richard Marcinko

quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way.
name: Satchel Paige

quote: Practice habits were crucial to my success.
name: Kobe Bryant

quote: Once you are labeled the best you want to stay up there, and you can’t do it by loafing around.
name: Larry Bird

quote: When you innovate, you’ve got to be prepared for everyone telling you you’re nuts.
name: Larry Bird

quote: Excellence is not a singular act, but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do.
name: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: The day I stop giving is the day I stop receiving. The day I stop learning is the day I stop growing.
name: Pat Summitt

quote: Leadership is about making others better as a result of your presence and making sure that impact lasts in your absence.
name: Sheryl Swoopes

quote: Great players respond to pressure, they don’t run from it.
name: Pat Riley

quote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: I’m not afraid of storms, for I’m learning how to sail my ship.
name: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Basketball is more than a game. It’s a way of life.
name: Chris Paul

quote: The name on the front of the jersey is more important than the name on the back.
name: Joe Lapchick

quote: The game has its ups and downs, but you can never lose focus of your individual goals.
name: Scottie Pippen
